message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

The paper combines language and vision to build vector-based word representations, which suggests that it could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories. However, given that the paper focuses on natural language processing and machine learning, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category. The paper also uses visual information extracted from natural images, which suggests that it could belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Additionally, the paper proposes a novel model for learning joint linguistic and visual features, which could fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper uses the model to improve image labeling and retrieval, which could also fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
